thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Grace

author: Grace
title: Grace
text: I have checked out many different flight finding websites and FlightHub was by far the easiest to navigate. FlightHub had the lowest rates out of all of the other sites I checked and when I clicked on a flight it didn't direct me to another website or even change the price like I witnessed with some of the other flight finder sites. The booking process was easy and simple and I was done within minutes of finding my flight. 10/10 would recommend FlightHub to anyone looking to get a flight for a reasonable price and with no booking hassle.
